sources.title: The Bat 1959 | Vincent Price, Agnes Moorehead | Mystery, Horror | Full Movie
sources.description:
A crazed killer known as "The Bat" is on the loose in a mansion full of people.

Original title: The Bat (1959)

Colorized version https://youtu.be/-1UuKmwVKpY

Director: Crane Wilbur
Writers: Crane Wilbur, Crane Wilbur 
Stars: Vincent Price, Agnes Moorehead, Gavin Gordon
Genres: Classics, Horror, Mystery, Thriller

This film is available with English, French, German, Italian & Spanish dubbed audio.  Go to video settings ⚙️  to change your audio / subtitle language options.

00:00 Full Movie
01:08 Cornelia Van Gorder, an author, rents a house called the Oaks for the summer, but the staff she brought with her is considering leaving due to rumors about a killer called the Bat and rabid bats in the area.
6:11 A bank officer and his doctor plot to steal a million dollars worth of securities and fake the officer's death in a hunting accident.
12:42 A woman and her maid experience strange occurrences in their house, including hearing noises and encountering a man without a face, while a notorious criminal known as the Bat is on the loose.
22:36 A bat bites the maid in the house, causing concern for rabies.
28:36 A doctor visits Miss Van Gorder's house after her maid is bitten by a bat, and they discuss the strange occurrences happening in the house.
33:09 Miss Van Gorder receives a signed first edition of a book from Judie and discusses her new servants and the possibility of hidden treasure in the house.
39:09 A murder occurs in a house and the Bat is suspected as the killer.
46:49 A group of people discuss the Bat and his motives, while Mark Fleming is found dead.
55:45 A mysterious killer known as the Bat terrorizes a group of people in a house.
1:10:01 Miss Van Gorder goes missing and the house is in chaos as a detective is found dead.
1:13:57 The Bat is still on the loose, but the hidden room and safe have been discovered and the stolen money recovered.
